err.message:
CypressError: `cy.visit()` failed trying to load:

http://127.0.0.1:5500/HelpFolder/shadowdom.html

We attempted to make an http request to this URL but the request failed without a response.

We received this error at the network level:

  > Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:5500

Common situations why this would fail:
  - you don't have internet access
  - you forgot to run / boot your web server
  - your web server isn't accessible
  - you have weird network configuration settings on your computer

tests.title: Type to Textbox within Light DOM
tests.fullTitle: Shadow dom Type to Textbox within Light DOM
tests.context: "assets/TC_04_ShadowDom.spec.js/Shadow dom -- Type to Textbox within Light DOM (failed).png"
tests.code:
cy.visit('http://127.0.0.1:5500/HelpFolder/shadowdom.html');
cy.get('input#channelname').type('QA BOX LET\'S TEST').should('have.value', 'QA BOX LET\'S TEST');
